Articles.Content: We all know who he is. Bumpersticker Cabbagepatch played Doctor strange, did a documentary about 'Pengwings' and he even has his own meme. What are your favourite names for Bicycle chainrepair?
I know a guy who calls him Beneficial Cucumber, but other than that I've got nothing.
Blampersnatcher Colanderman did a thing on 'Pengwings'? Never knew. Personally know Blueberry Calculatrice best for that detective thing, Sherlock.
I've called him Benedict Cummerbund. I didn't know it was a "thing" though.

Seeing the title i thought "oops, another epitaph ?".

nb: gb suggests bc, ok ?

:-)
Beelzebub Custardpie, the man with the tallest face.

BBC CBB?

Edited October 4, 2018 by NSEP

Risky topic.

Most I heard are far from PG ...
When i saw him as a Star Trek villain i could not avoid but imagine an old lazy red dragon lying on his gold picking his teeth with a huge toothpick ...

On 10/3/2018 at 12:46 PM, Kernel Kraken said:

We all know who he is. Bumpersticker Cabbagepatch played Doctor strange, did a documentary about 'Pengwings' and he even has his own meme. What are your favourite names for Bicycle chainrepair?

when i change a chain i usually just use 3 flat edge screwdrivers of various sizes, a hammer, and a slab of wood/metal/concrete/something hard. stick the chain on the hard thing, stick the small screwdriver between the links, thwack it. move to the next bigger screwdriver and repeat, do it one more time with the big screwdriver. now the link should be disconnected and can be taken apart. to put the chain back together, use a pair of channel lock pliers to pop the peg back in the link. not only is it effective its reversable. you can also join multiple chains together if you need to for some reason. one bike i used this trick on had a couple of busted derailers so i picked my favorite gear and cut the chain down to fit, result working one speed bike.

I hate it when my bicycle chain slips off, especially if I accidentally sleep until 8:03 and school starts at 8:15. I made it this time, because my chain didn't slip. If my chain slips I have to turn the whole thing upside-down and get my fingers dirty putting it back on.

9 hours ago, Ultimate Steve said:

I hate it when my bicycle chain slips off, especially if I accidentally sleep until 8:03 and school starts at 8:15. I made it this time, because my chain didn't slip. If my chain slips I have to turn the whole thing upside-down and get my fingers dirty putting it back on.

set your stops on your derailers.
How did this go from Beneficial Carrotstick to how to fix a bike?

18 hours ago, Kernel Kraken said:

How did this go from Beneficial Carrotstick to how to fix a bike?

My thought was.... why does he even rate a KSP thread all to himself to start with???

I mean Benevolent Cumbersnatch is awesome and all, but does he make a better Dr. Who or Sherlock?

15 hours ago, Gargamel said:

My thought was.... why does he even rate a KSP thread all to himself to start with???

 

Because I've run out of places to find memes.
